job.description: {"@context": "http://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "datePosted": "2021-08-20T22:51:49.000Z", "description": "<p>Looking for an Embedded Software Engineer who will be developing code for new electric vehicles.</p><p><br></p><p>Candidates must have a strong background in Automotive or Electric Vehicle industry to be considered for this role.</p><p><br></p><p>Skills/Experience Required:</p><p><br></p><p>\u00b7 5+ years experience in the automotive / EV industry</p><p>\u00b7 C++, Python</p><p>\u00b7 Coding for Software, Firmware or hardware applications</p><p>\u00b7 understanding of BMS or Inverters</p><p>\u00b7 Hands-on</p><p>\u00b7 B.S. or higher in technical field</p>", "employmentType": "FULL_TIME", "hiringOrganization": {"@type": "Organization", "name": "Vivid Resourcing Ltd", "sameAs": "https://uk.linkedin.com/company/vivid-resourcing-ltd", "logo": "https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEQf2YW-QI9Dw/company-logo_200_200/0/1519881878763?e=1637798400&v=beta&t=77uWnLgMW4kCsgk7mYKbN_-YIvxr7pVt4cCgaPWYdS0"}, "identifier": {"@type": "PropertyValue", "name": "Vivid Resourcing Ltd"}, "image": "https://media-exp1.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEQf2YW-QI9Dw/company-logo_100_100/0/1519881878763?e=1637798400&v=beta&t=0r-sIAKoI9JR75xr4nZ0RO_cFY1pnHbuHSVs9nNN_fA", "industry": "Automotive", "jobLocation": {"@type": "Place", "address": {"@type": "PostalAddress", "addressCountry": "US", "addressLocality": "San Francisco Bay Area", "addressRegion": null, "postalCode": "94112", "streetAddress": null}, "latitude": 37.39271, "longitude": -122.042}, "skills": "", "title": "Embedded Software Engineer", "validThrough": "2021-10-15T19:25:59.000Z", "educationRequirements": {"@type": "EducationalOccupationalCredential", "credentialCategory": "bachelor degree"}, "experienceRequirements": {"@type": "OccupationalExperienceRequirements", "monthsOfExperience": 60}}
